ygData.subject: Re: Glowing Stein...
ygData.msgSnippet: thanks... but i think the quest is broken... bcos verant remove one of the bartenders and on some server the bartender wont talk... so u cannot do this... even
ygData.messageBody:
thanks... but i think the quest is broken... bcos verant remove one of the
bartenders and on some server the bartender wont talk... so u cannot do
this... even if u can... most likely u need some enchanter to help u out...

err... u sure u got is necro research stuff? necro use words leh... pages
for enchanters i think... hehe..

Nic
----- Original Message -----
From: LKW <leekw13@...>
To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, August 19, 1999 11:02 AM
Subject: RE: [sg-everquest] Glowing Stein...


> From: LKW <leekw13@...>
>
> Ah....but I think at high lvl nuker won't use melee weap anymore, like les
> is now carrying book in his primary weap slot. Sad to say, I haven't
reach
> this stage, hehe. Nevertheless it's still a good boost in stats, esp in a
> situation where the caster role in a camping trip (with grp) is just to
> nuke, nuke and nuke ;)
>
> So how to do this quest? ;)
>
> Ziltus
>
> p/s: I think I have a rare necro page in my bank, been keeping for u since
> I got it. It's mean for some high lvl necro research I think, will pass u
> to when I see u.
>
> On Thursday, 19 August, 1999 9:34 AM, Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy
> [SMTP:sccheng@...] wrote:
> > if u have a glowing stein... get rid of it by trading something else...
> check this out...
> >
> > Upon the test server if you had a Glowing Stein, you now have a Stein of
> Moggok. The stats are supposedly the same as the Glowing Stein yet you
must
> put it in your primary melee slot. This means that you cannot wield the
> Stein and a 1H Blunt weapon at the same time. This could be carried over
to
> the main servers soon.
> >
> >
> > cheers,
> > Nicademous
